    • Uses of HidDeviceInfo in purejavahidapi

      Fields in purejavahidapi declared as HidDeviceInfo 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected HidDeviceInfo HidDevice.m_HidDeviceInfo 
      Methods in purejavahidapi that return HidDeviceInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HidDeviceInfo HidDevice.getHidDeviceInfo()
      This method returns the same info that the PureJavaHidApi.enumerateDevices() would return for this device.
      Methods in purejavahidapi that return types with arguments of type HidDeviceInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<HidDeviceInfo> PureJavaHidApi.enumerateDevices()
      Returns a list of available USB HID devices.
      Methods in purejavahidapi with parameters of type HidDeviceInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HidDevice PureJavaHidApi.openDevice(HidDeviceInfo path)
      Given a device path opens a USB device for communication.
